title: Cupid no Itazura: Madoi no Reiko
original_name: クピドの悪戯 惑いのレイコ
sinopse:
Takeru, a salaryman who can't seem to get on in the world, spends his days being oppressed by his beautiful and strict female boss. However, when he discovers the past she tries to cover up, the wheels of fate begin to turn.

(Source: MU)
